runs.comm: beaten, short of a good length outside off, nipped away as Levi tried to cut that, just went past the outside edge
on the pads this time, good bounce but it clips the pads to go past short fine leg for a boundary, misdirected there, South Africa are away
shortish on middle, jabbed through square leg into the deep for a single
Amla chased that one, shortish outside off, moved towards it to punch it through the off side, got an under-edge
a short ball down the leg side and Amla lets it go, called a wide
slower one dropped short outside off and Amla cashes in, cracks it hard past extra cover from the crease for a boundary
down the leg side once more, tries to clip it fine, misses, called a wide once again
edged, short and wide and he tries to smash that over point, gets a thick outside edge and it flies over slip to the third-man boundary
gets that to move in to the batsman, good bounce again, shortish and he tries to turn square, is struck on the thigh
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and works it through square, gently played and the fielder in the deep takes a while to run in, a couple more
pitched on a good length, chases that one to play it through cover, gets a thick inside edge
shortish on middle, rocks back and drops it behind square for an easy single
four more, lucky though, dropped that one short and Levi went for the pull, got a top-edge but fine leg is wide, gets a boundary
wide, banged in short but well outside leg stump
an inswinging full toss on middle and leg and it's been punched to mid-on, a fumble but no run conceded
angling in from round the wicket, shortish, gets on the back foot and punches it into the leg side for a single
tossed up on the off and it's driven back to the bowler
angling in towards middle, gets forward and pushes that towards long-on for a single
pushed that through quicker, knocked it into the leg side wide of square leg and raced through for a single, an attempt at a direct hit but Amla's in comfortably, almost collided with Price
a bit of air on that one, drives it neatly down to long-on for a single
that's missed everything, went on straight, Amla made room to cut it past point, missed, and so did Taylor behind the stumps, wins South Africa some byes, went over middle
pitched fullish on middle, clipped uppishly through midwicket for a single
short and wide, slashed away but lands on the bounce towards third man for a single
nicely bowled, that one came back in, pitched on a good length, Amla had shaped up for a flowing drive through the off side, it moved back in to beat him through the gate
short of a good length, tries to force that through point, gets a thick inside edge
drops that short on middle, gets across to work it behind square, clips the thigh and they get a single
slower one and he picked it, landed slightly short and he smacked it over mid-on for a one-bounce four
angling in towards middle, that's been worked towards short fine from the crease
slightly short on middle, pushed wide of mid-on for a single
gets front and across and turns it towards midwicket
punched that one off the back foot to long-on for a single
comes down the track to whip it through square leg, struck high on the pads there, Amla's not quite middling it today
and just as I say that, he dispatches that short delivery through point and cover, moved back and creamed it through the off side
quick single, goodish length with some inswing, pushed gently towards mid-off for a single

gets across there, bowled just outside off, pushed wide of cover for a quick single, a direct hit onto the stumps at the non-striker's end and the ball ricochets on to Vitori's shin, he was in some pain but all good now
shortish outside off and that's been crashed in front of square, past the covers for a boundary, raises the half-century for South Africa, they're more than halfway through the chase
mistimes this time, not much width this time, hits the bat hard, knocked away towards point
straying on the pads, clipped wide of a squarish fine leg for a couple of runs
lovely timing, short of a good length, rocked back and with a minimum of effort, just punched it past cover, South Africa are racing away here, way too dominant
shortish on middle and leg, whipped through square leg into the deep for a single
shapes up for a reverse-sweep but mistimes it, gets it towards deep cover for just a single when the intended area was point
shortish and helps it on its way fine, but towards short fine leg
comes down the track to that flattish delivery and pushes it to long-off for a single
shortish on the off, punched down to long-on for a single
short on the off, whipped straight to midwicket
pushed that one down the ground to long-on for a single
flighted, Amla comes down the track and drives it towards deep midwicket for a single
on the leg stump and Levi tries to reverse-sweep that past point, missed
slides that one down the leg side, clips the pads before being collected by Taylor
the googly, pushes that one away from the crease past midwicket for a single
gets on the back foot, knocks it down into the leg side, wide of the bowler, for another single
gets outside the line of off stump and pushes that past the diving bowler to long-on for a single
Levi takes that off a length and dispatches that into the gap between long-on and deep midwicket for a one bounce four
strikes that one hard, swings it away towards deep midwicket for a single
Amla gets back and punches that straight to midwicket
comes down the track and pushes that to long-off for a single, had to play that slightly inside out
shortish and he made some room to crack that wide of long-off for a couple of runs
pops up off the pads, was the googly that I'm not sure Amla picked, just a single into the leg side
floating it outside leg stump, tickles the pads on the way to short fine
pitched up on middle, drives that after making a bit of room to long-off for a single
flicked away through square leg into the deep for a single
the sweep, all along the ground, struck hard to the right of deep midwicket for a couple of runs
tries to sweep that one fine but can't get it past the diving short fine leg
floating it on the off stump, pushes it back to the bowler
flat and quick on middle and leg, tickles that one to short fine leg
thrashed, short, made some room and absolutely smashed it through extra cover for a boundary
slides that down the leg side and it's called a wide
drives that straight one to long-off for a single
shortish on the off, punched to the left of deep cover for a couple of runs
crunches it down towards long-off for a single to keep strike, one hit will do it now
dropped, short and wide and it was cut straight to Sibanda at point, he dived to his left but spilt a sharp chance, tried to take it on the second attempt as well but couldn't hold on
good yorker, Levi tried to dig it out into the leg side, got an inside edge onto his shoes
well timed, goodish length, pushes it firmly through extra cover into the deep for a couple more runs
low full toss and he mistimes a drive back to the bowler, who palms it off to mid-off
drops that one short on leg stump and he tries to duck under it, that's one for the over
yorker length and he fails to dig it out, was outside off and he couldn't get his bat down in time
short, too short, outside off, just flicked it past midwicket for a single, wants Levy to get to his half-century
fifty for Levi, helps end a poor run of scores, cracked to long-on for a single
flighted on leg stump, tries to sweep it square, struck on the pads, stifled appeal from Matsikenyeri
flighted on middle, pushed down to long-on to end the game, South Africa have thrashed Zimbabwe here
